attributes.action: Ask David Cameron to consider withdrawing his resignation.
attributes.background: Mr Cameron recently resigned following the Leave vote in the EU referendum. He has been an effective leader for 6 years and half the country supported his position on remaining in the EU.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
